official_title: To provide for a pay adjustment for the Chairman, Members, and General Counsel of the Federal Labor Relations Authority.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to Federal officials and employees to provide for pay adjustments for the Chairman, Members, and General Counsel of the Federal Labor Relations Authority.
